data.name: Colormeleons - GoldEdition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC give you the GoldEdition content of your new favorite game colormeleons:

- Goldi, the Goldenmeleon which drops golden paint.
- 10 Units of golden paint
- The chance to get a goldenmeleon-egg (as a very rare platime drop)
- Golden rank on our Discord
- A golden picture frame for your studio
- Get your own nametag: Goldplayers can ask the Dev to add a special Tag Item to boxes and storepage. With these Tags you can give your name to your golden Meleon!
...

data.short_description: Goldi, the Goldenmeleon and aunt of your Colormeleon was left by her husband for a young pinkmeleon - and needs a please to sleep for a while. So she visits her nephew for some months and supports the team with the best she can give: Golden Paint!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or simular
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Direct3D and DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
